content.html: Number of times in the last 10 years I’ve found a problem with a computer due to an actual virus: 0. Number of times in the last 10 years I’ve found a problem with a computer due to the completely unnecessary third-party virus checker when the OS provides one: lots.
content.value:
Number of times in the last 10 years I’ve found a problem with a computer due to an actual virus: 0.

Number of times in the last 10 years I’ve found a problem with a computer due to the completely unnecessary third-party virus checker when the OS provides one: lots.
